Define Documentation

#define ATOMIC (   CODE)
Value:
do { \
        cpu_flags_t __flags; \
        IRQ_SAVE_DISABLE(__flags); \
        CODE; \
        IRQ_RESTORE(__flags); \
    } while (0)

Execute CODE atomically with respect to interrupts.

See also:
IRQ_SAVE_DISABLE IRQ_RESTORE
